mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_full_notice (iteacher, full_title, full_contents, full_notice_fix) VALUES (#{iteacher}, #{fullTitle}, #{fullContents}, #{fullNoticeFix})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(full_notice_fix) from t_full_notice WHERE full_notice_fix = 1

SELECT A.full_title AS fullTitle, A.full_contents AS fullContents, A.iteacher AS writer, B.teacher_nm AS writerName, A.created_at AS createdAt, A.full_notice_fix AS fullNoticeFix FROM t_full_notice AS A JOIN t_teacher AS B ON A.iteacher = B.iteacher WHERE A.ifull_notice = #{ifullNotice}
